mapper.select: SELECT id,franchisee_id FROM trains.train_model_franchisee WHERE auth_end_date < NOW() AND `status` = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE trains.train_model_franchisee SET status = 1 WHERE id = ${id} AND auth_end_date < NOW()
UPDATE trains.supply_protocol_shop SET status = 5 WHERE franchisee_id = ${franchisee_id} AND auth_end_date < NOW()
UPDATE (SELECT * FROM trains.pc_role WHERE franchisee_id = ${franchisee_id}) r INNER JOIN trains. pc_menu_role mr ON r.id = mr.role_id SET mr.`status` = 1
